content: sts 60 round 2 chain 1 hdc2tog half_double_crochet blo in next 12 sts hdc2tog blo half_double_crochet blo in next 13 sts hdc2tog blo half_double_crochet blo in next 13 sts hdc2tog blo half_double_crochet blo in next 14 sts 56 figure 5 copyright © 2022 anna lee hennin cat hat | 3 hennin cat hat | crochet pattern by anna lee about sizing from the author as i mentioned in the notes section at the beginning i hope you enjoyed working with this pattern as a depending on your gauge and yarn choices the sphynx cat parent i need to make sure my kitty is finished measurement may vary warm in cold weathers in addition to sweaters girl s gotta keep her ears warm too to obtain your desired measurement if 1 you are using yarn bee soft & sleek dk try a finding a crochet cat hat patten that covers the ears different size hook it would vary by 1/2 to 1 inch was challenging i couldn t find any so here it is 2 you want to make it larger than an extra inch use this hat works up quickly and it s a fun addition to a heavier yean weight with the suggested hook size your cat s wardrobe by that yarn use a different size hook to adjust the measurement as needed happy hooking and keep your kitties warm cheers make it your own this is a really fun project you can customize it by using different color combinations or dress it up with copyright a pom pom make it fun and make it your own -- the possibility is endless the content in this pattern including text photos and design is the property of anna lee you may not duplicate this content in any way either whole or in parts you may not claim this content as your own sell it or distribute it in any way or form you are welcome to share the link to this pattern you may do as you wish the item you make from this pattern however i do ask that you include a link to this pattern and give me credit for the pattern if you are selling your makes copyright © 2022 anna lee hennin cat hat | 4
